path: To Be Organized/Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/Director/Viz Director.docx
text: Viz Director Director is used in ELC based control rooms. It has a local MSE that runs as service in Windows. In the event that it needs to be restarted for troubleshooting, close out of the Viz Director application, open windows services, and stop/restart Viz Media Sequencer from there. More information about Director will be added here in the future.
